org.spongepowered.api.item.recipe.crafting

Interface CraftingRecipe

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CatalogType, Recipe
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ShapedCraftingRecipe, ShapelessCraftingRecipe

    @CatalogedBy(value=CraftingRecipes.class)
public interface CraftingRecipe
extends Recipe, CatalogType
    A CraftingRecipe represents some craftable recipe in the game.

    It is essentially a Predicate that checks for if a recipe is valid as well as a function from a crafting matrix to a list of ItemStack (the crafting result), therefore making it an immutable interface.

    The passed in CraftingGridInventory is usually a crafting inventory, e.g. a 2x2 or 3x3 crafting matrix.

    The requirements of a CraftingRecipe can be general, they just have to eventually return a boolean given an crafting grid.

    • Method Detail

      • isValid

        boolean isValid(CraftingGridInventory grid,
                World world)
        Checks if the given CraftingGridInventory fits the required constraints to craft this CraftingGridInventory.
        Parameters:
        grid - The CraftingGridInventory to check for validity
        world - The world this recipe would be used in
        Returns:
        True if the given input matches this recipe's requirements

      • getResult

        ItemStackSnapshot getResult(CraftingGridInventory grid)
        This method should only be called if isValid(CraftingGridInventory, World) returns true.

        This method is preferred over the Recipe.getExemplaryResult() method, as it customizes the result further depending on the context.

        Implementing classes are advised to use the output of Recipe.getExemplaryResult(), modify it accordingly, and return it.

        Parameters:
        grid - The crafting input, typically 3x3 or 2x2
        Returns:
        An ItemStackSnapshot

      • getResult

        default Optional<CraftingResult> getResult(CraftingGridInventory grid,
                                           World world)
        Returns the CraftingResult for the current crafting grid configuration and the World the player is in.

        Returns Optional.empty() if the arguments do not satisfy isValid(CraftingGridInventory, World).

        Parameters:
        grid - The crafting input, typically 3x3 or 2x2
        world - The world this recipe would be used in
        Returns:
        A CraftingResult if the arguments satisfy isValid(CraftingGridInventory, World), or Optional.empty() if not

      • getRemainingItems

        List<ItemStackSnapshot> getRemainingItems(CraftingGridInventory grid)
        This method should only be called if isValid(CraftingGridInventory, World) returns true.

        A list of items to be added to the inventory of the player when they craft the result. For example, if a player crafts a ItemTypes.CAKE, the empty buckets are returned to their inventory.

        Parameters:
        grid - The crafting input, typically 3x3 or 2x2
        Returns:
        The list of items to be added to the inventory of the player when the recipe has been fulfilled (possibly empty)

      • getGroup

        Optional<String> getGroup()
        The group this CraftingRecipe belongs to or Optional.empty() if not defined.
        Returns:
        The group this Recipe belongs to.

      • shapedBuilder

        static ShapedCraftingRecipe.Builder shapedBuilder()
        Provides a Builder for a ShapedCraftingRecipe.
        Returns:
        The Builder.

      • shapelessBuilder

        static ShapelessCraftingRecipe.Builder shapelessBuilder()
        Provides a Builder for a ShapelessCraftingRecipe.
        Returns:
        The Builder.
